title: Add theme toggle with dark/light mode and persistence
description:
Implements BEAD-004: Theme toggle for dark/light mode

- ThemeContext with localStorage persistence
- useTheme hook for accessing theme state
- ThemeToggle component with sun/moon icons
- CSS variables for theme colors
- Respects system preference as fallback
reviewComments: Code review passed. Clean implementation with: proper TypeScript types, localStorage persistence, system preference detection, SSR guard, good accessibility (aria-label/title), CSS variables for theming, smooth transitions. Build and lint both pass.
buildOutput: tsc -b && vite build succeeded - 37 modules transformed, built in 996ms

title: Add API reference section with endpoint listings
description:
Complete API reference documentation section with:
- Typed endpoint data structure with 10 example endpoints
- Reusable Endpoint components (MethodBadge, EndpointCard, EndpointDetail)
- ApiReference page with collapsible category sidebar
- Displays parameters, responses, and request/response examples
- Covers Users, Documents, and Authentication API categories
reviewComments: Code review passed. Clean API reference implementation with: well-typed endpoint data structure, reusable Endpoint components, collapsible category sidebar, parameter/response documentation, code examples. Build passes.
buildOutput: tsc -b && vite build succeeded - 36 modules transformed, built in 907ms

title: Add documentation pages with collapsible sidebar navigation
description: Implements BEAD-002: Documentation pages with collapsible sidebar navigation. Includes Sidebar component with recursive nav sections, DocNav for table of contents, DocsPage with 3-column layout, and responsive CSS with dark/light mode support.
reviewComments: Code review passed. Clean docs implementation with: recursive collapsible sidebar, table of contents with smooth scrolling, 3-column layout, proper accessibility (aria attributes), react-router integration. Build passes.
buildOutput: tsc -b && vite build succeeded - 45 modules transformed, built in 1.13s

title: Add homepage with hero section and feature cards
description: Create main landing page with Hero component (gradient background, CTA buttons) and 6 FeatureCard components showcasing documentation platform features. Uses Tailwind CSS 4 for styling.
reviewComments: Code review passed. Excellent homepage with: gradient hero section with decorative orbs, 6 feature cards with icons, responsive design, Tailwind CSS styling, clean component structure. Build passes.
buildOutput: tsc -b && vite build succeeded - 32 modules transformed, built in 839ms

title: Homepage with hero section and feature cards
description: Built the main landing page with a Hero component featuring gradient background and CTAs, plus a Features section with 4 feature cards highlighting Documentation, Search, API Reference, and Themes capabilities.
reviewComments: CONFLICT: This homepage implementation conflicts with MR-004 (homepage-dev) which was already approved for BEAD-001. Homepage-dev was the official assignee for the homepage bead. This MR cannot be merged as it would create a duplicate/conflicting implementation.
buildOutput: Build passes but MR cannot merge due to conflict with MR-004

title: Add search modal with Ctrl+K shortcut
description: Implement search modal triggered by Ctrl+K keyboard shortcut. Features keyboard navigation, search filtering, ESC to close, click outside to dismiss, focus management, and light/dark mode support.
reviewComments: Code review passed. Excellent search modal with: Ctrl+K/Cmd+K shortcut, keyboard navigation (arrows, enter, escape), click outside to close, focus management, search filtering, type badges, light/dark mode via prefers-color-scheme. Clean hook implementation. Build passes.
buildOutput: tsc -b && vite build succeeded - 35 modules transformed, built in 902ms
